attributes.action: Ban Companies From Using Non Recyclable Cups In The UK!
attributes.additional_details: Please review Hugh's War on Waste for the full details!
attributes.background: Millions of cups are used in the UK, Big companies like Costa Coffee, Cafe Nero, McDonald's and Starbucks are using cups that are not 100% recyclable! Only 1% of cups are recycled which can only occur in a high tech plant in which there is 2 in the UK! They need fully recyclable cups!! Reduce Waste!
